attributes.action: Conduct a review of routes into work for new graduates.
attributes.additional_details:
We want the Government to review the job opportunities available to new graduates and how graduates can get the experience necessary to do those jobs.  
Please help to give us a chance.
attributes.background: We believe that many graduates, myself included, who spent £27k+ on university are struggling to find jobs. Entry-level roles often demand experience, which feels unfair, as we're constantly rejected for lacking it. We need opportunities, yet many of us lack industry connections.
